attributes.action: Donate tax raised from the sale or download from David Bowie's music to charity
attributes.additional_details: What better way to honour David Bowie's memory. He turned down all honours, so honour his memory by saving lives tomorrow.
attributes.background: Let us utalise the outpouring of grief from the untimely and tragic death of David Bowie for something positive. David has and will continue to be a leading light in British culture. His life works have raised huge sums of money for the treasury. Now donate future tax revenue to fund cancer research

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because it does not call for clear action. However we could accept a petition calling for the Government to waive VAT on sales of David Bowie’s music for a set period.
